courseDetails.title: Easy Guitar for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Step by step guitar course. 5 minute lessons. Learn to play chords, melodies, warm up exercises, music theory...
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the guitar for beginners course!


My name is Filip Flego, I am a professional guitar player and teacher, and I will lead you through the process of learning guitar.


We will start from the absolute beginning, and we will cover basic chords, melodies, rhythms, and left and right-hand techniques. We will do all that using original songs composed specially for this course.


Now and then, there are warm-up and theory lessons.
Warm-up lessons will help you develop different techniques, synchronize between left and right hand, and gain strength in the left hand.

Theory lessons will help you to systemize all the knowledge that you will gain.


Each lesson video lasts for max. 5 minutes. I suggest you dedicate 15 to 30 minutes to each lesson. Make pauses and watch some parts twice if you need it.

My other suggestion is that you practice at least 5 days in a week.


Every lesson is structured this way (except warm-up lessons and theory lessons):

1) I play the song

2) Explanation step by step - here you are learning. Make pauses if you need or watch some parts twice.

3) We play together - when you feel confident about your playing, here we do it together! ;)

4) After each lesson, you will download the PDF file with notation, TABs, comments, and further explanations to better understand what you have just learned to play, as well as to learn how you can write and read music.


IF YOU ARE NOT SATISFIED WITH THIS COURSE AFTER THE PURCHASE, THERE IS A 30 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE!


If you never touched a guitar before, and don't know anything about music (but you would love to play guitar, and understand music), I designed this course for you.

courseDetails.title: Curso Python: Transformación y Limpieza de Datos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Jorge, con experiencia en análisis de datos, te enseñará Python de una manera fácil y sencilla.

Uno de los grandes desafíos que enfrentan los analistas de datos es el manejo de datos faltantes y valores erróneos. Pero no te preocupes, este curso te enseñará cómo identificar, gestionar e incluso imputar datos faltantes de manera avanzada, para que nunca más te detengas ante este tipo de problemas.

La reestructuración y limpieza de datos es otro de los pilares fundamentales en la manipulación de datos, y aquí aprenderás cómo eliminar duplicados, manejar valores atípicos y reestructurar tus datasets para que queden listos para su análisis. Imagina la sensación de tener un conjunto de datos limpio y ordenado a tu alcance.

También dominarás la transformación y combinación de datos, permitiéndote reorganizar columnas, fusionar diferentes fuentes y resolver conflictos de información. ¡Tus datos estarán siempre bajo control! Además, aprenderás técnicas de conversión y normalización que te permitirán trabajar con datos categóricos y numéricos como un verdadero profesional.

A lo largo del curso, descubrirás cómo aplicar funciones personalizadas y cómo agrupar, resumir y exportar datos en diversos formatos para compartirlos con otros equipos o utilizarlos en presentaciones.

¿Y qué hay del manejo de fechas y tiempos? También lo abordarás en profundidad, así que estarás listo para trabajar con cualquier tipo de datos temporales que se te presenten.

Finalmente, el curso culmina con un proyecto final donde aplicarás todos los conocimientos adquiridos, trabajando con datos reales y enfrentándote a situaciones que te prepararán para el mundo laboral.

No esperes más para dar el salto que tu carrera necesita. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza a dominar la manipulación de datos con Python! Este es el curso que te abrirá puertas y te permitirá destacar en cualquier proyecto de análisis de datos. ¡Tu futuro comienza hoy!

courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you looking to take your business or brand to the next level with email marketing? Email marketing is one of the most powerful and cost-effective ways to connect with your audience, nurture relationships, and ultimately drive sales. In this comprehensive course, you’ll learn everything you need to know to build, grow, and manage a successful email list—whether you’re a beginner or someone looking to refine your email marketing skills.


Throughout this course, we’ll walk you through the entire process of email list building from start to finish. We’ll begin by explaining why building an email list is so important for your business and how it can help you build direct, lasting relationships with your audience. You’ll gain a clear understanding of how email marketing can generate measurable results that other platforms simply can’t match.


You’ll learn how to create irresistible lead magnets that will entice potential subscribers to join your list. These lead magnets could be free guides, templates, checklists, or any other valuable resource that speaks directly to your target audience’s needs. By offering valuable content in exchange for their email addresses, you'll grow your list quickly and effectively.


In addition, you’ll discover how to design high-converting opt-in forms and landing pages that encourage visitors to subscribe to your list. You’ll also learn how to place these forms strategically on your website to maximize sign-ups, turning casual visitors into engaged email subscribers. We’ll dive into the best practices for writing engaging emails, crafting attention-grabbing subject lines, and creating compelling calls to action (CTAs) that will lead to higher conversions.


One of the most valuable lessons you’ll learn in this course is how to segment your email list to ensure you’re sending the right message to the right people. Whether you're targeting customers who’ve already purchased from you or leads who just downloaded your free guide, segmentation allows you to send more personalized, relevant emails, which leads to higher engagement rates and improved customer loyalty.


The course doesn’t stop there—once you've mastered the basics of list-building and email content, we’ll introduce you to more advanced strategies for scaling your list. You’ll learn how to leverage paid advertising on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Google Ads to rapidly expand your reach and attract more subscribers. We’ll also cover how to use social media, contests, and giveaways as powerful tools for driving traffic to your opt-in forms.


By the end of this course, you will not only know how to grow your email list from scratch, but you will also be equipped with the tools and strategies to engage your audience, drive conversions, and create long-term, profitable relationships with your subscribers. This course will empower you to turn email marketing into one of your most valuable assets, capable of delivering consistent, measurable results for your business.


What You’ll Learn:


  • The fundamentals of email marketing and why it’s crucial for business growth

  • How to create irresistible lead magnets and high-converting opt-in forms

  • Strategies for increasing email sign-ups using your website, social media, and paid ads

  • How to craft compelling email content, subject lines, and CTAs to boost engagement

  • Techniques for segmenting your list to send more personalized, relevant emails

  • Advanced list-building strategies, including using contests and giveaways for rapid growth


Key Features:


  • Practical, step-by-step guidance from start to finish

  • Learn how to design and promote high-converting lead magnets and opt-in forms

  • Master segmentation techniques to personalize your campaigns for better results

  • Explore paid ads, social media promotion, and other advanced strategies for scaling your email list


Whether you're a small business owner, freelancer, or digital marketer, this course is designed for anyone who wants to build a robust and effective email list. No prior experience is required—this course is beginner-friendly and provides actionable insights and strategies that will help you grow your email list quickly and effectively. If you’re ready to unlock the power of email marketing and grow your business, enroll now and start building your email list today!
targetAudiences: Small Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: This group includes individuals who are looking to grow their online presence and build a solid customer base through email marketing. They may have limited experience with digital marketing but are eager to learn how to capture leads and nurture customer relationships via email

Freelancers and Solopreneurs: Freelancers and solopreneurs looking to expand their client base and increase conversions will benefit from this course. They can use the knowledge gained to create targeted email campaigns, offer lead magnets, and build a list of potential clients to engage with and market to

Marketing and Sales Professionals: This group includes professionals in marketing, digital marketing, and sales who are looking to enhance their email list-building skills. They may already have experience in digital marketing but want to deepen their knowledge of growing and segmenting email lists to improve their campaign effectiveness and lead generation efforts

courseDetails.title: التجارة الإلكترونية: دليل شامل لإطلاق بزنس تجارة إلكترونية
courseDetails.shortDescription: كيف أبني بزنس تجارة إلكترونية بشكل كامل من الصفر إلى الإحتراف
courseDetails.longDescription:
مرحبا بك في دورة التجارة الإلكترونية بحيث ستتعلم فيها كل ما تحتاجه من أجل البدأ في التجارة الإلكترونية خطوة بخطوة من إطلاق متجر إلكتروني خاص بك أونلاين إلى الحصول على المنتجات المناسبة التي تعمل عليها في مجال التجارة الإلكترونية و حتى تصوير و إطلاق الإعلانات بالطريقة المثلى التي تساعدك على الحصول على الكثير من المبيعات، كيف تستطيع الحصول على أحسن سعر من الموردين إلى غاية عمل تطوير في البزنس و مضاعفة الأرباح التي تحصل عليها من التجارة الإلكترونية


لست بحاجة إلى أي مهارات أو معارف مسبقة حتى تدخل إلى هذه الدورة التدريبية ببساطة لأن هذه الدورة من الصفر و قمت بتلخيص فيها كل ما تحتاجه للعمل في مجال التجارة الإلكترونية خطوة بخطوة كما أن المدرس لرقم فارس سيكون سعيد جدا بالإجابة على كل إستفساراتك و تساؤلاتك حول التجارة الإلكترونية فقط أنت بحاجة إلى حاسوب و إتصال بشبكة الأنترنت و رغبة حقيقية لإطلاق بزنس التجارة الإلكترونية


في نهاية هذه الدورة التدريبية ستكون قادر على إطلاق متجر إلكتروني إحترافي و تكن لك كامل القدرة على تكييف هذا المتجر الإلكتروني كما تريد أنت ليتناسب مع المنتجات التي تريد بيعها بنمط التجارة الإلكترونية كل ما عليك فعله هو البحث عن منتجات لبيعها كما سأشارك معك في هذه الدورة الشاملة المتعلقة بالتجارة الإلكترونية إطلاق لها إعلانات و إدراجها على موقعك الخاص و البدأ بعملية البيع أسعى في هذه الدورة التدريبية لجعلك رائد أعمال مستقل قادر على بدأ مشروع تجارة خاص بك من خلال موقع إلكتروني، لا أريد إعطائك وعود واهية على أن التجارة الإلكترونية ستجعلك تذر آلاف الدولارات بمجرد أن تبدأ في العمل عليها و إنما من يصنع النجاح الحقيقي هو أنت و مدى رغبتك في النجاح حقا لذا إن كانت لك الرغبة و الدافع يمكنك حقا تحقيق الهدف المسطر من الدورة و التخلي عن العمل التقليدي و البدأ في بزنس خاص بك


تم تصميم هذه الدورة لتتناسب تماما مع المبتدئين الذين لم يسبق لهم أن حققوا أي مبيعات في مجال التجارة الإلكترونية لذا سأسعى جاهدا على شرح لك كل شيء سواء نظريا أو تقنيا و كيف تقوم به خطوة بخطوة من الحاسوب و بالتفصيل الممل ستحصل على كل ما تحتاجه من أجل الإنطلاق حقا في التجارة الإلكترونية


تم تصميم هذه الدورة خصيصا لكل من يريد:

  1. إطلاق بزنس تجارة إلكترونية

  2. لكل مستقل يبحث عن تطوير دخله من خلال التجارة الإلكترونية

  3. لكل تاجر إلكتروني يريد فهم الفيسبوك أدس أكثر و كيف يجعله يحقق نتائج أفضل

  4. لكل من يريد الإنتقال من عبودية الوظيفة إلى ريادة المشاريع
targetAudiences: لكل موظف يسعى للحصول على مضاعفة لدخله
لكل رائد أعمال يفكر في البدأ في التجارة الإلكترونية
لكل من يبحث عن مهارات يريد بيعه لكل من يعمل في التجارة الإلكترونية

courseDetails.title: Digital Marketing for Beginners: Digital Marketing Basics
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the Basics of Digital Marketing: SEO, Social Media, Content Creation, and Paid Ads for Beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:

In today’s fast-paced, online-driven world, digital marketing is no longer optional—it’s a necessity. In this course, you’ll learn the core principles of digital marketing and how to effectively apply them across various channels, including SEO, social media marketing, content creation, and paid advertising. courseDetails.title: Marketing Guide: Social Media Marketing for Beginners

  • Platform-Specific Strategies: Each social media platform has its own unique features and best practices. We’ll break down how to tailor your content and approach to platforms like Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Twitter, ensuring you’re reaching the right audience in the right way.

  • Creating and Optimizing Your Social Media Profiles: Learn how to create attention-grabbing, professional profiles and optimize them for increased visibility and engagement. Your profiles are your digital storefront, and we’ll ensure they stand out to potential customers and followers.

This course is packed with practical tips, real-world examples, and actionable strategies to help you execute a successful social media marketing plan, whether you’re aiming to increase brand awareness, drive traffic to your website, or boost conversions and sales.


By the end of this course, you'll have a solid understanding of social media marketing and the confidence to implement effective strategies that drive results. courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende Tableau paso a paso. ¡Ejercicios del mundo real para aprender practicando!
courseDetails.longDescription:
En la era del big data, la capacidad de transformar datos en decisiones estratégicas es más valiosa que nunca. Te presentamos nuestro curso integral de Tableau, diseñado para llevarte desde los fundamentos hasta las técnicas más avanzadas de análisis y visualización de datos. ¡Inscríbete hoy y comienza tu viaje hacia la maestría en Tableau!

Con nuestro curso, no solo aprenderás qué es Tableau y cómo instalarlo, sino que también dominarás la interfaz y descubrirás cómo extraer datos en tiempo real y conectar diversas fuentes de datos para obtener una perspectiva completa. Desde entender dimensiones y medidas hasta realizar análisis predictivos y tendencias, este curso está estructurado para proporcionarte una formación robusta y práctica.

Adéntrate en los secretos del diseño de dashboards atractivos y funcionales. Aprende a crear visualizaciones básicas y avanzadas, selecciona gráficos adecuados y utiliza paletas de colores, tamaños y formas para comunicar con claridad y eficacia. Además, te enseñaremos a guardar y compartir tus visualizaciones, para que tu trabajo tenga el impacto que merece.

Te ofrecemos la oportunidad de trabajar con fechas, realizar cálculos básicos y avanzados, y mejorar la estética de tus dashboards con filtros y tooltips. Explora los módulos dedicados a la publicación y compartición, así como recursos adicionales que incluyen frames, imágenes de fondo, iconos personalizados y gráficos avanzados.

Este curso es tu puente hacia el éxito en el mundo del análisis de datos. No solo te prepararás para obtener certificaciones reconocidas, sino que también te equiparás con habilidades prácticas y aplicables demandadas en todas las industrias.

¡No esperes más! Únete a nuestra comunidad de analistas de datos y comienza a dar vida a tus datos con Tableau. Inscríbete ahora y da el primer paso hacia una carrera llena de logros y descubrimientos.
targetAudiences: Profesionales de negocios y analistas que buscan potenciar sus habilidades en análisis y visualización de datos para tomar mejores decisiones basadas en insights claros y detallados.
Estudiantes que desean complementar sus estudios académicos con habilidades prácticas en una de las herramientas de BI más demandadas en la industria.
Profesionales de TI y bases de datos que deseen ampliar su arsenal técnico con capacidades avanzadas de visualización de datos.
Emprendedores y dueños de negocios que quieren visualizar y entender mejor los datos de su empresa para identificar tendencias y oportunidades de crecimiento.
Aficionados al análisis de datos que deseen aprender a contar historias y presentar datos de manera efectiva utilizando Tableau.
Cualquier persona con curiosidad sobre cómo los datos pueden transformarse en visualizaciones comprensibles y cómo estas pueden influir en la toma de decisiones estratégicas.

courseDetails.title: Amazon SEO for Beginners: How to Rank Higher on Amazon
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Amazon SEO: Boost Your Product Rankings, Drive Traffic, and Increase Sales on Amazon
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to unlock the full potential of your Amazon listings and drive your sales through the roof? Look no further! Amazon SEO for Beginners: How to Rank Higher on Amazon is the ultimate guide to optimizing your Amazon product listings and mastering the strategies that will help you rank higher, attract more customers, and increase your sales.


Whether you're just starting out as an Amazon seller or you're looking to take your existing business to the next level, this course will teach you everything you need to know to succeed. With a clear, step-by-step approach, this course breaks down the core concepts of Amazon SEO, ensuring that even beginners can easily follow and apply what they learn. By the end of this course, you’ll have the skills and confidence to optimize your Amazon listings and get your products noticed by more customers.


In this comprehensive course, you’ll discover how Amazon’s powerful A9 algorithm works and how to use it to your advantage. You’ll learn how to select the best keywords for your product listings and incorporate them effectively into your titles, descriptions, and backend search terms. You'll also gain insights into optimizing every part of your listing, from product titles and bullet points to descriptions, ensuring that your listings stand out in Amazon’s competitive marketplace.


The course will guide you through the entire process of keyword research, teaching you how to identify high-performing keywords that drive traffic to your listings. You’ll also learn how to use both short-tail and long-tail keywords, balancing broad search terms with specific, high-intent phrases that can help increase your conversions.


We dive deep into the importance of product reviews and customer feedback in Amazon SEO. You’ll learn how to manage your reviews effectively, how to handle negative feedback, and how to encourage satisfied customers to leave positive reviews. Positive reviews not only build customer trust but also improve your rankings on Amazon, and we’ll show you how to leverage them for maximum impact.


One of the most powerful tools for improving visibility on Amazon is Sponsored Ads. In this course, you’ll learn how to use Amazon Sponsored Ads to boost your product’s exposure, increase traffic to your listings, and improve your organic rankings. We’ll show you how to set up effective ad campaigns, target the right keywords, and monitor your ad performance to maximize results.


By the end of this course, you’ll have a solid understanding of how Amazon SEO works and how to apply these strategies to your own product listings. You’ll be able to make informed decisions to optimize every part of your Amazon presence, ensuring that your products appear at the top of search results, attract more customers, and ultimately increase your sales.


What you’ll learn:


  • How Amazon’s A9 search algorithm works and how to leverage it to rank higher in search results

  • The importance of keyword research and how to find the best keywords for your listings

  • How to optimize product titles, descriptions, and bullet points for maximum visibility

  • Strategies for managing customer reviews and using feedback to boost rankings

  • How to use Amazon Sponsored Ads to enhance your listings and improve your organic rank

  • How to understand Amazon Sales Rank (BSR) and how to improve it

  • The best practices for optimizing your backend keywords for better search relevance

  • And much more!


Who should take this course:


  • Aspiring Amazon sellers who are just starting and want to learn how to optimize their product listings

  • Entrepreneurs and small business owners who want to grow their sales on Amazon and increase product visibility

  • E-commerce marketers and digital marketing professionals looking to expand their skill set by learning Amazon-specific SEO strategies

  • Anyone interested in improving their Amazon product rankings and boosting their sales through effective SEO techniques


With clear lessons, expert advice, and actionable strategies, this course provides everything you need to know to succeed in the Amazon marketplace. Whether you want to drive more traffic, boost conversions, or improve your product’s ranking on Amazon, this course has you covered.


Take the first step toward Amazon success and enroll today! Learn how to optimize your listings, attract more customers, and take your Amazon business to new heights!
targetAudiences: Aspiring Amazon Sellers: Individuals who are new to selling on Amazon and want to learn how to effectively optimize their product listings to improve visibility and sales on the platform

Small Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: Small business owners or entrepreneurs who have a product listed on Amazon and are looking to enhance their Amazon presence through SEO techniques to drive more traffic and increase sales

E-commerce Marketers and Digital Marketing Professionals: Professionals working in e-commerce or digital marketing roles who want to broaden their skillset by learning how to optimize product listings for Amazon’s search engine and gain a deeper understanding of Amazon SEO strategies

courseDetails.title: Introduction to Stocks: Stock Market Basics for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: A Beginner's Guide to Investing, Understanding Stock Prices, and Building a Diversified Portfolio
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to take control of your financial future but unsure where to begin when it comes to investing in the stock market? This comprehensive course is designed specifically for beginners who want to learn the fundamentals of stock market investing and start building wealth with confidence, even if they have no prior experience.


The world of stocks and investments can seem overwhelming, but this course breaks everything down into simple, easy-to-understand lessons. You will gain a solid understanding of how the stock market works, from buying and selling stocks to the factors that influence stock prices and the key players involved. You’ll learn the basic principles of how to assess the value of a stock and how market forces like supply and demand impact its price. By the end of this course, you’ll have the foundational knowledge needed to start making informed decisions about investing.


In this course, you will also explore the different types of stocks—common and preferred—and learn about other investment options, such as bonds, ETFs, and mutual funds. Understanding the risks and rewards of each type of investment will empower you to build a well-rounded portfolio that aligns with your financial goals and risk tolerance. Whether you're aiming for long-term growth or seeking income-generating stocks, this course provides the knowledge to tailor your strategy.


You’ll also dive into the critical aspects of stock price analysis, learning how to read stock quotes and interpret key market indicators like the Dow Jones, S&P 500, and NASDAQ. These indicators provide valuable insights into overall market health and can guide your investment decisions. As the stock market fluctuates, understanding these indicators will help you stay informed about market trends and make confident choices about when to buy or sell.


Throughout the course, we’ll guide you in developing your own investment strategy. You'll learn how to assess your risk tolerance, the importance of diversification, and how to set clear financial goals that will help you succeed in the long run. Whether you plan to invest for retirement, grow your savings, or generate passive income, this course will equip you with the tools and confidence you need to take that first step.


This course is perfect for anyone looking to gain financial literacy and start their investment journey with a solid foundation. Even if you're just starting out or want to refresh your knowledge of the stock market, you'll find everything you need to begin your journey to financial independence.


By the end of the course, you’ll be able to confidently navigate the stock market, track your investments, and make strategic decisions to grow your wealth. You’ll have a clear understanding of the stock market’s mechanics and how to invest responsibly, giving you the foundation you need for long-term financial success.


What you will learn:


  • The basics of how the stock market operates and its key players

  • The difference between common and preferred stocks, and the best investment options for beginners

  • How to read stock quotes and interpret essential market data

  • How to assess the risks and rewards of stock investing to make informed decisions

  • How to build a diversified portfolio and create an investment strategy that aligns with your goals


Who is this course for?


  • Beginners who want to start investing in stocks but don’t know where to begin

  • Young professionals and students looking to build wealth early in their careers

  • Anyone looking to improve their financial literacy and make smarter investment decisions

  • Individuals who want to take control of their financial future and start investing with confidence


Don't wait to take control of your financial future—enroll today and take your first step toward becoming a confident, successful investor!
targetAudiences: New Investors and Beginners: Individuals who are new to investing and want to understand the basics of the stock market, including how to buy and sell stocks, assess stock prices, and manage risks. This group includes those who have little or no prior experience with stock investing

Young Professionals and Students: Young individuals looking to start building wealth early in their careers by investing in the stock market. They may be interested in learning how the stock market works to make informed investment decisions and begin their financial journey

Individuals Seeking Financial Literacy: Adults who want to improve their financial knowledge and better understand how the stock market works as part of their overall personal finance management. This group may include those looking to diversify their income streams or prepare for retirement by gaining confidence in investing

courseDetails.shortDescription: Executive Certificate: Marketing Strategy, Customer Experience Management, Generative AI GPT, Segmentation, CJM, CX, VoC
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Program: Executive Certificate in Marketing & Customer Experience Management Excellence


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.


What is Marketing?

  • Definition: Marketing is the process of identifying customer needs, creating products or services that fulfill those needs, and communicating the value of those offerings to potential customers.

  • Focus: Marketing focuses on getting the right message to the right audience, ultimately driving interest and sales.

  • Key Activities:

    • Market research

    • Product development

    • Brand building

    • Advertising and promotions

    • Content creation

    • Customer relationship management


What is Marketing Management?

  • Definition: Marketing management is the strategic and operational process of planning, organizing, implementing, and controlling an organization's marketing resources and activities.

  • Focus: Marketing management aims to create a cohesive marketing plan, optimize resource allocation, and measure the effectiveness of marketing initiatives.

  • Key Activities:

    • Developing marketing strategies and plans

    • Setting marketing budgets

    • Managing marketing teams

    • Overseeing marketing campaigns

    • Analyzing marketing performance (tracking metrics and ROI)

    • Making adjustments to strategies as needed


The Relationship Between Marketing and Marketing Management

Think of marketing as the actions you take to promote your business, and marketing management as the overarching system to plan, execute, and refine those actions strategically.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in marketing and business

courseDetails.title: Power BI: Transformación y limpieza de datos con Power Query
courseDetails.shortDescription: Juan Carlos, con más de 10 años de experiencia en Business Intelligence, te enseñará a transformar datos en Power BI.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Embárcate en un viaje de descubrimiento y dominio de Power Query dentro de Power BI con este curso especializado. Diseñado para aquellos que buscan perfeccionar sus habilidades en la transformación y manipulación de datos, este curso cubre exhaustivamente todas las facetas de Power Query, un componente esencial en el ecosistema de Power BI.

Enfoque del Curso:

  • Introducción a Power Query: Comienza con los fundamentos, aprendiendo a navegar en la interfaz y entender los conceptos clave de la manipulación de datos.

  • Conexión a Diversas Fuentes de Datos: Dominarás la importación de datos desde fuentes como CSV, Excel, web y PDF.

  • Transformaciones Básicas y Avanzadas: Aprende a renombrar columnas, cambiar tipos de datos, y aplicar filtros, además de explorar transformaciones más complejas utilizando expresiones M.

  • Operaciones de Agrupación y Combinación: Desarrolla habilidades para combinar y anexar datos, esenciales para análisis avanzados.

  • Creación de Columnas Personalizadas y Uso de Parámetros: Avanza hacia la creación de columnas calculadas y la implementación de parámetros para personalizar y automatizar tus análisis.

¿Para Quién es Este Curso? Este curso es ideal para analistas de datos, profesionales de negocios, y usuarios de Excel que desean profundizar en Power BI, específicamente en Power Query. Es perfecto para aquellos que buscan mejorar la calidad y la eficiencia en la preparación de sus datos para análisis.

Resultados del Curso: Al finalizar, tendrás una comprensión profunda de cómo utilizar Power Query para transformar datos crudos en conjuntos de datos limpios y manejables. Estarás equipado con las habilidades prácticas para aplicar estas técnicas en escenarios reales, mejorando significativamente la eficiencia y efectividad de tus proyectos de análisis de datos.

¡Inscríbete ya y transforma tu habilidad con los datos en una herramienta poderosa para el análisis y la toma de decisiones inteligentes!
targetAudiences: Analistas de negocios que desean profundizar en Power BI para crear reportes interactivos y dashboards.
Profesionales de cualquier sector que necesitan transformar grandes volúmenes de datos en insights accionables.
Estudiantes y académicos interesados en aprender una herramienta líder de business intelligence para aplicar en investigaciones o proyectos.

En este curso aprenderás a utilizar NumPy, la biblioteca de Python más poderosa para la manipulación y análisis de datos numéricos. Desde la creación y manipulación de arrays hasta la realización de complejas operaciones de álgebra lineal, NumPy te proporcionará todas las herramientas necesarias para trabajar eficientemente con grandes conjuntos de datos.

Desarrolla habilidades prácticas que te permitirán optimizar tu trabajo en ciencia de datos y programación, aumentando tu productividad y precisión en el análisis de datos. Con NumPy, podrás realizar operaciones matemáticas y estadísticas avanzadas de manera rápida y sencilla, lo que te permitirá enfocarte en interpretar resultados y tomar decisiones informadas.

A lo largo de este curso, abordarás desde los fundamentos hasta las técnicas avanzadas, asegurando una comprensión profunda y completa de NumPy. Aprenderás a configurar tu entorno de trabajo, crear y manipular arrays, realizar operaciones de broadcasting, utilizar funciones universales y mucho más. Cada lección está diseñada para ser práctica y aplicada, garantizando que puedas transferir lo aprendido a tus proyectos diarios.

Además, con el proyecto final, podrás aplicar todo lo aprendido en un contexto real, consolidando tus conocimientos y preparándote para enfrentar desafíos profesionales en ciencia de datos, ingeniería y más. Este proyecto te permitirá demostrar tus habilidades en programación numérica, desde la manipulación de datos hasta la presentación de resultados.

¡Domina NumPy y lleva tus habilidades de programación numérica al siguiente nivel! No solo aprenderás a usar esta poderosa biblioteca, sino que también te convertirás en un experto en análisis y manipulación de datos, una habilidad invaluable en el mundo moderno de la ciencia de datos y la programación.

courseDetails.title: eBay SEO for Beginners: How to Rank Higher on eBay
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master eBay SEO for Beginners: Optimize Your Listings, Increase Visibility, and Boost Sales
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you an aspiring eBay seller looking to make your products stand out in a crowded marketplace? Or perhaps you're an experienced seller struggling to get your listings noticed? In this comprehensive, beginner-friendly course, you’ll learn how to optimize your eBay listings and harness the power of eBay’s search engine to increase your product visibility, drive more traffic, and ultimately boost your sales.


eBay SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is the key to getting your products in front of the right buyers. The eBay search engine, Cassini, ranks listings based on relevance, quality, and customer experience. If you want your products to show up at the top of search results, understanding eBay SEO is essential. This course will teach you the strategies and techniques used by top eBay sellers to dominate the search results and outperform their competitors.


In this course, we break down the fundamentals of eBay SEO in easy-to-follow lessons. You'll start by learning the key factors that influence your search rankings, such as product titles, descriptions, item specifics, and high-quality images. You’ll also explore how to use eBay’s tools and features to refine your listings and boost visibility in search results.


You’ll learn how to craft optimized titles that catch the attention of both eBay’s algorithm and potential buyers. With the right keywords in your title and description, you’ll increase the chances of your products appearing in relevant searches. We’ll show you how to write compelling product descriptions that convert visitors into buyers, while also satisfying the SEO requirements of eBay’s search engine.


Understanding how to use item specifics—like size, color, brand, and condition—is critical for both SEO and providing a positive customer experience. We’ll teach you how to fill out these fields correctly to help eBay categorize your products accurately, making it easier for buyers to find your listings.


We also cover the importance of visual content—from high-quality product images to videos and 360-degree views. You’ll learn how these visuals not only improve the buyer experience but also influence your ranking in search results. Plus, we’ll discuss the importance of customer service, seller ratings, and feedback scores, all of which play a significant role in your SEO success.


By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge and tools you need to:


  • Optimize your eBay listings: Learn how to write SEO-friendly titles and descriptions, select the right categories, and fill out item specifics to increase visibility.

  • Understand eBay’s search engine: Grasp how eBay’s search engine works, what factors influence rankings, and how you can make your listings more relevant to potential buyers.

  • Boost your sales with images and videos: Understand the impact of high-quality product images and videos, and learn how to use them effectively to increase conversions.

  • Track your progress: Learn how to measure your success using eBay’s Seller Hub and analytics tools, and continuously refine your listings for optimal performance.

  • Leverage eBay’s tools for ongoing improvement: Discover how to keep your listings up-to-date, experiment with pricing and promotions, and stay ahead of the competition.


Whether you’re just starting out or looking to optimize your existing eBay store, this course will give you the confidence and skills to improve your product visibility, attract more buyers, and increase your sales.


With a combination of expert advice, practical tips, and actionable steps, this course is your complete guide to mastering eBay SEO. You’ll be equipped with everything you need to make your eBay listings stand out in search results and grow your online business.


Don’t miss out on the opportunity to boost your sales and maximize your eBay potential. Enroll now and take the first step toward becoming an eBay SEO expert!
targetAudiences: New eBay Sellers: Individuals who are just starting to sell on eBay and want to learn how to optimize their listings for better search visibility and sales. This group includes people who have little to no experience with eBay SEO and are seeking a comprehensive guide to build their eBay business from the ground up

Small Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: Business owners who want to expand their product reach on eBay and improve their online sales. These learners may already have a business but are looking for strategies to enhance their eBay presence and attract more customers through better search rankings

Freelancers and eCommerce Consultants: Freelancers or consultants who work with eBay sellers and want to deepen their knowledge of eBay SEO to help their clients optimize listings and boost sales. This group seeks to provide specialized SEO services for eBay sellers and improve their clients' online visibility

What is Project Management?

Project management is the organized application of knowledge, processes, skills, and tools to guide a project from its beginning to its successful completion. It involves:

  • Defining goals: Deciding what the project should achieve.

  • Planning: Mapping out the steps and resources needed.

  • Executing: Putting the plan into action, directing the team, and managing resources.

  • Monitoring and controlling: Tracking progress, managing changes, and addressing issues.

  • Closing: Reviewing the project, documenting results, and learning from the experience.


What is Business Project Management?

Business project management refers to applying project management principles within a business setting. These projects focus on achieving business objectives such as:

  • Launching new products or services

  • Improving or automating business processes

  • Restructuring departments

  • Implementing new software systems


The Role of Project Management

Project management plays a critical role in businesses because it:

  • Increases Efficiency: A well-defined project plan helps streamline work and avoid wasted effort.

  • Ensures Results: Project management keeps the focus on meeting defined goals within time and budget restrictions.

  • Manages Risk: Potential problems are anticipated and mitigated through careful planning and monitoring.

  • Improves Communication: Clear communication channels among team members, stakeholders, and clients help avoid misunderstandings.

  • Improves Client Satisfaction: Successful project completion within agreed-upon parameters builds trust with clients.


Why is Learning Project Management Important for Companies?

Companies invest in their employees' project management training because:

Competitive Advantage: Companies with strong project management capabilities deliver projects more successfully, gain a reputation for reliability, and outperform competitors.

Reduces Costs: Inefficient projects cost more due to delays and wasted resources. Project management helps optimize resources.

Enhances Employee Morale: Well-run projects minimize stress, improve team collaboration, and create a sense of accomplishment.

Improves Innovation: Structured project management allows for managing innovation projects, leading to a culture of innovation within the company.


How Project Management Skills Boost Your Career

Developing your project management skills can significantly enhance your career prospects:

High Demand: Project managers are in demand across industries like IT, construction, healthcare, etc.

Better Salary: Skilled project managers often earn higher salaries due to their expertise.

Leadership Potential: Project management provides a solid foundation for taking on leadership roles within organizations.

Versatility: Project management skills apply to a wide range of jobs and roles, not just project management positions.

Personal Growth: You'll build organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills, making you an asset to any team
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Project Management

courseDetails.title: Crea juegos 2D con  JAVASCRIPT Y CANVAS
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a programar Juegos en JS.  creación de niveles , dificultades y mucho más!
courseDetails.longDescription:
El mundo de los juegos es grande y fascinante y divertido , hay muchas lenguajes de programacion  y posiblidades para desarrollarlos y una de la más usadas y potentes es JavaScript, para que tus juegos puedan estar implementadas  en la web, y de accesso a todo el mundo desde dispositivos tan usados como tablets, smartphones . Por ello en este curso aprenderas a desarrollar con JavaScript diferentes rutinas y funciones enfocadas al desarrollo de un juego, aunque tales conocimientos igualmente puedes orientarlos a tus propios objetivos.



que es javascript?

JavaScript es un lenguaje de programación que los desarrolladores utilizan para hacer páginas web interactivas. Desde actualizar fuentes de redes sociales a mostrar animaciones y mapas interactivos, las funciones de JavaScript pueden mejorar la experiencia del usuario de un sitio web. Como lenguaje de scripting del lado del servidor, se trata de una de las principales tecnologías de la World Wide Web. Por ejemplo, al navegar por Internet, en cualquier momento en el que vea un carrusel de imágenes, un menú desplegable “click-to-show” (clic para mostrar), o cambien de manera dinámica los elementos de color en una página web, estará viendo los efectos de JavaScript.


¿Qué es la programación orientada a objetos ?

La programación orientada a objetos (Object Oriented Programming, OOP) es un modelo de programación informática que organiza el diseño de software en torno a datos u objetos, en lugar de funciones y lógica. Un objeto se puede definir como un campo de datos que tiene atributos y comportamiento únicos.

programadores
ingenieros de sistemas

The short course "Research Methodologies" aims to provide an introductory understanding of scientific research in Administration. This course equips students with the necessary skills to design, develop, and evaluate research plans. As future business managers, students should be able to use data collection techniques and instruments to develop or improve business strategies, such as questionnaires, interviews, and document analysis.

At the end of the course, students should be able to:

  • Understand the characteristics of management research.

  • Explain techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data.

  • Write, present, and disseminate scientific work.

  • Understand ethical principles in research.

  • Prepare bibliographical references.


The structure of the search methodologies course:

  • Characteristics and paradigms of management research

  • Techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data

  • Research methodologies

  • Writing, presenting, and disseminating scientific work

  • Ethics in research

  • Bibliographical references


This course lays the foundation for both academic success and effective business management by equipping students with the essential skills to conduct rigorous research and analyze complex information.


1. Scientific Activity and Capstone Project Preparation

  • Research Design: The course empowers students to design robust research studies. This includes formulating clear research questions, selecting appropriate methodologies, and collecting and analyzing data systematically. These skills are crucial for scientific investigations and directly applicable to the Capstone Project, where students are expected to conduct independent research.

  • Critical Thinking and Data Analysis: Students learn to approach information critically, evaluate evidence, and draw sound conclusions. This analytical mindset is essential in science and in crafting a compelling Capstone Project that demonstrates a deep understanding of a chosen topic.

  • Scientific Communication: The course helps students develop effective communication skills, enabling them to present their findings clearly and persuasively, both in written and oral formats. This skill is vital for sharing research results within the scientific community and defending the Capstone Project before a panel.


2. Application in Real Business and Management

  • Informed Decision-Making: In the business world, decisions must be based on solid evidence. The course equips students with the tools to conduct market research, analyze competitor strategies, and evaluate the effectiveness of various business initiatives. This data-driven approach minimizes risks and maximizes opportunities.

  • Problem-Solving: Businesses constantly face challenges. The course teaches students to identify problems, gather relevant data, analyze the root causes, and develop effective solutions. This structured problem-solving approach is invaluable for managers at all levels.

  • Performance Evaluation: The ability to measure and compare results is essential for continuous improvement. The course enables students to track key performance indicators, identify trends, and make data-driven adjustments to optimize business outcomes.

  • Innovation and Adaptation: The business landscape is constantly evolving. The course fosters a mindset of curiosity and inquiry, encouraging students to stay abreast of new developments, conduct research, and adapt their strategies to remain competitive.


"Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies" provides students with a versatile skillset that is crucial for both academic and professional success. By emphasizing rigorous research, critical thinking, and effective communication, the course empowers students to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and drive innovation in the dynamic world of business.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Business or Science

courseDetails.title: Curso SQL - Consultas en SQL para principiantes + ChatGPT
courseDetails.shortDescription: Jorge, con experiencia en bases de datos, te enseñará SQL desde cero.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Aprende SQL desde cero y conviértete en un experto en bases de datos con este curso completo de SQL. Este curso te guiará a través de todos los aspectos esenciales de SQL, desde la creación de bases de datos y consultas básicas hasta la optimización avanzada de consultas.

En este curso, adquirirás un sólido conocimiento de SQL y desarrollarás habilidades prácticas que te permitirán trabajar eficientemente con bases de datos. Comenzaremos con una introducción detallada a SQL y su importancia en el campo laboral actual, explorando las diversas oportunidades profesionales que ofrece.

Aprenderás a instalar y configurar MySQL en Windows, crear bases de datos y gestionar usuarios. Conocerás la sintaxis básica de SQL y utilizarás la popular herramienta MySQL Workbench para ejecutar consultas.

Dominarás las consultas SELECT con una sola tabla, aprenderás a utilizar alias de columnas y a filtrar datos utilizando la cláusula WHERE. Descubrirás los operadores de comparación y lógicos para realizar consultas más complejas, y utilizarás operadores como BETWEEN, LIKE e IN para refinar tus resultados.

Exploraremos las cláusulas ORDER BY y LIMIT para ordenar y limitar los resultados de tus consultas. Aprenderás a utilizar funciones de agregado como COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX y MIN para obtener información resumida de tus datos. Además, entenderás los conceptos de llaves primarias y foráneas, y te sumergirás en el mundo de los joins, incluyendo inner join, left join y right join.

Además, este curso te enseñará a utilizar subconsultas en diferentes cláusulas (SELECT, FROM, WHERE y HAVING) para realizar consultas más complejas y obtener datos específicos. Aprenderás a identificar y optimizar consultas lentas, utilizando índices y ajustando la memoria caché para mejorar el rendimiento de tu base de datos.

Enriqueciendo aún más el contenido del curso, se incluye un módulo innovador sobre la integración de ChatGPT para la creación y consulta de bases de datos. Aprenderás a utilizar las capacidades avanzadas de ChatGPT para generar consultas SQL, interpretar y analizar resultados de bases de datos, y automatizar tareas de gestión de datos. Este enfoque te permitirá aprovechar la inteligencia artificial para facilitar el manejo de grandes volúmenes de datos y realizar consultas complejas de manera más eficiente. Con ejemplos prácticos y ejercicios interactivos, podrás ver cómo ChatGPT puede ser una herramienta poderosa para complementar tus habilidades en SQL y llevarte al siguiente nivel en el campo de las bases de datos.


Con ejemplos prácticos y ejercicios, este curso te brinda las herramientas necesarias para convertirte en un experto en SQL y maximizar tu eficiencia en el manejo de bases de datos. No importa si eres un principiante absoluto o si ya tienes experiencia en SQL, este curso te llevará desde los fundamentos hasta la optimización de consultas, brindándote las habilidades necesarias para destacar en el campo laboral.


¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu camino hacia la maestría en SQL!
targetAudiences: Está dirigido a quienes dan sus primeros pasos hacia una formación de Data Analyst (Analista de datos), Data Scientist (Científico de Datos) o de DBA (Data Base Administrador - Administrador de Bases de Datos).

courseDetails.title: Certificado Profissional em Gestão de Projetos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Compreender a Gestão de Projetos, Funções Principais, Papel de um Gestor de Projeto, Project Lifecycle, Metodologia
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da IBM, Intel e Microsoft, e membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 213 países e foi escolhido por mais de 560 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva é uma profissional distinta com uma sólida combinação de experiência académica e empresarial, especializada em gestão, ética, desenvolvimento estratégico e liderança. Obteve o Doutoramento em Gestão pela Universidade Lusíada de Lisboa, onde se destacou nas áreas de gestão empresarial, e-commerce, análise crítica de modelos de gestão e metodologias de investigação avançadas, recebendo grande reconhecimento pelas suas contribuições na área.

Atualmente, exerce funções como Gestora de Projetos na Associação Portuguesa de Ética Empresarial (APEE). Este papel sublinha o seu compromisso com a promoção da inovação ética e da sustentabilidade nas organizações e nos setores público e privado.

Relativamente à sua área académica, Ana Saraiva fez contribuições significativas como consultora e investigadora no centro de investigação COMEGI da Universidade Lusíada. Colaborou com prestigiadas instituições nacionais e internacionais, incluindo o IST (Universidade de Lisboa) e várias universidades europeias, avançando na investigação e implementando soluções inovadoras nas práticas de gestão organizacionais. A sua experiência editorial inclui a gestão e indexação de revistas científicas em plataformas como Scopus, DOAJ e outras de prestígio, refletindo a sua dedicação nos elevados padrões académicos.

Com uma experiência empresarial de mais de uma década, Ana trabalhou na hotelaria de luxo, onde liderou esforços na coordenação de eventos, na garantia de qualidade e na satisfação dos hóspedes. Possui um histórico comprovado de melhoria da excelência operacional e gestão estratégica, sendo uma líder versátil e capaz de impulsionar resultados nos mais diversificados contextos.

A produção académica de Ana Saraiva é vasta, incluindo numerosos artigos revistos por pares e apresentações em conferências que abordam questões críticas em gestão, ética e transformação digital. É proficiente numa ampla gama de ferramentas e plataformas digitais, como SPSS, SAS e NVivo, utilizadas para otimizar os resultados de investigação e de negócios.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso com práticas éticas e sustentáveis, Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva dedica-se a capacitar organizações e indivíduos para alcançar a excelência através de soluções inovadoras e liderança responsável no panorama global dos negócios.


O que é Gestão de Projetos?

Gestão de projetos é a aplicação organizada de conhecimentos, processos, habilidades e ferramentas para guiar um projeto desde o seu início até a sua conclusão bem-sucedida. Envolve:

  • Definir metas: Decidir o que o projeto deve alcançar.

  • Planejamento: Mapear as etapas e os recursos necessários.

  • Execução: Colocar o plano em ação, direcionar a equipe e gerenciar os recursos.

  • Monitoramento e controle: Acompanhar o progresso, gerenciar mudanças e resolver problemas.

  • Encerramento: Revisar o projeto, documentar os resultados e aprender com a experiência.


O que é Gestão de Projetos de Negócios?

A gestão de projetos de negócios refere-se à aplicação de princípios de gestão de projetos em um ambiente de negócios. Esses projetos se concentram em alcançar objetivos de negócios, como:

  • Lançamento de novos produtos ou serviços

  • Melhorar ou automatizar processos de negócios

  • Reestruturar departamentos

  • Implementar novos sistemas de software


O Papel da Gestão de Projetos

A gestão de projetos desempenha um papel fundamental nas empresas porque:

  • Aumenta a Eficiência: Um plano de projeto bem definido ajuda a otimizar o trabalho e evitar o desperdício de esforço.

  • Garante Resultados: A gestão de projetos mantém o foco em cumprir as metas definidas dentro das restrições de tempo e orçamento.

  • Gerencia Riscos: Problemas potenciais são antecipados e mitigados por meio de planejamento e monitoramento cuidadosos.

  • Melhora a Comunicação: Canais de comunicação claros entre membros da equipe, stakeholders e clientes ajudam a evitar mal-entendidos.

  • Melhora a Satisfação do Cliente: A conclusão bem-sucedida do projeto dentro dos parâmetros acordados gera confiança com os clientes.


Por que aprender gestão de projetos é importante para as empresas?

As empresas investem no treinamento de gestão de projetos de seus funcionários porque:

  • Vantagem Competitiva: Empresas com fortes capacidades de gestão de projetos entregam projetos com mais sucesso, ganham reputação de confiabilidade e superam os concorrentes.

  • Reduz Custos: Projetos ineficientes custam mais devido a atrasos e desperdício de recursos. A gestão de projetos ajuda a otimizar os recursos.

  • Melhora o Moral dos Funcionários: Projetos bem administrados minimizam o estresse, melhoram a colaboração da equipe e criam um senso de realização.

  • Melhora a Inovação: A gestão de projetos estruturada permite gerenciar projetos de inovação, levando a uma cultura de inovação dentro da empresa.


Como as habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos impulsionam sua carreira

Desenvolver suas habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos pode melhorar significativamente suas perspectivas de carreira:

  • Alta Demanda: Gerentes de projeto são procurados em todos os setores, como TI, construção, saúde, etc.

  • Melhor Salário: Gerentes de projeto qualificados geralmente ganham salários mais altos devido à sua experiência.

  • Potencial de Liderança: A gestão de projetos fornece uma base sólida para assumir funções de liderança dentro das organizações.

  • Versatilidade: As habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos se aplicam a uma ampla gama de empregos e funções, não apenas a cargos de gerenciamento de projetos.

  • Crescimento Pessoal: Você desenvolverá habilidades organizacionais, de resolução de problemas e de comunicação, tornando-se um trunfo para qualquer equipe.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

courseDetails.title: Blog Marketing Guide: How to Grow a Blog for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Blogging from Scratch: Grow, Optimize, and Monetize Your Blog for Success
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to turn your passion into a successful blog, but don’t know where to start? Whether you’re looking to share your expertise, build a personal brand, or even make money online, this course is designed specifically for beginners who want to learn how to create, grow, optimize, and monetize a blog. No prior experience is required—just the desire to learn and a willingness to put in the work to build your blog from the ground up.


In this comprehensive, step-by-step course, you'll discover the essential strategies needed to create a blog that stands out and attracts an audience. We’ll start with the basics, guiding you through the process of setting up your blog on a platform like WordPress, choosing the perfect niche, and designing a blog that’s not only visually appealing but also easy for readers to navigate. You’ll gain a clear understanding of how to create and publish content that is valuable, engaging, and geared towards the interests of your target audience.


But a great blog isn’t just about publishing content—it’s about making sure the right people find it. That’s where SEO (Search Engine Optimization) comes in. You’ll learn how to optimize your blog posts for search engines so that your content ranks higher in Google searches, helping you attract more organic traffic without paying for ads. We'll walk you through keyword research, on-page SEO techniques, and the importance of optimizing images and meta descriptions to ensure your blog is optimized for visibility and performance.


We’ll also dive into the power of social media and networking, showing you how to promote your blog across platforms like Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook to build a loyal following. You’ll learn how to leverage collaborations and guest posting to expand your reach, all while maintaining meaningful engagement with your audience.


Once your blog is set up and driving traffic, we’ll explore how to turn your blog into a source of income. You’ll discover several proven monetization strategies, including affiliate marketing, display advertising, selling digital products, and even offering freelance services. Whether you’re looking to earn a passive income or generate full-time revenue, you’ll find actionable strategies that will help you start making money from your blog.


By the end of this course, you will:


  • Have a fully functional blog that reflects your personal style or brand.

  • Create consistent, high-quality content that attracts and engages your audience.

  • Understand SEO techniques that drive organic traffic and improve your search rankings.

  • Be equipped with the skills to grow your blog through social media and networking.

  • Know how to monetize your blog through affiliate marketing, digital products, and other income-generating methods.


This course is perfect for anyone looking to build a blog that not only gets noticed but also has the potential to generate revenue. Whether you’re a hobbyist who wants to share your passion with the world, a small business owner looking to create a powerful online presence, or an aspiring entrepreneur wanting to create a blog that drives income, this course will provide you with the tools, tips, and strategies to succeed.


Don’t let confusion or overwhelm stop you from starting your blogging journey—enroll today and begin building your blog with confidence, knowing you have all the information you need to grow it into a successful and profitable venture!

courseDetails.title: Power BI: Gráficos y visualización de datos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Juan Carlos, con más de 10 años de experiencia en Business Intelligence, te enseñará visualizaciones en Power BI
courseDetails.longDescription:
Sumérgete en el mundo del análisis de datos con nuestro exhaustivo curso de Power BI. Este curso está especialmente diseñado para aquellos que buscan profundizar en la visualización de datos, desde principiantes hasta profesionales. A lo largo de nuestro programa, explorarás los fundamentos de los gráficos y la importancia de la visualización de datos, empezando con conceptos básicos y avanzando hacia técnicas más sofisticadas.

Abordarás gráficos básicos como barras y columnas apiladas, barras y columnas agrupadas, y aprenderás a dar formato y estilo a tus visualizaciones en Power BI para una comunicación de datos más efectiva. Te adentrarás en gráficos avanzados, incluyendo gráficos de funnel, dispersión, y circulares, así como gráficos de árbol y mapas, desarrollando habilidades para analizar y representar datos complejos.

Este curso de Power BI también te capacitará en técnicas especializadas como la creación de gráficos de áreas apiladas, gráficos de cinta, y small multiples, así como en la aplicación de analíticos y forecasting para predecir tendencias futuras. Además, te sumergirás en gráficos flat como gráficos de tarjeta, tacómetros, y gráficos de KPI, perfeccionando tu habilidad para presentar métricas clave y datos críticos.

Con un enfoque práctico, realizarás un caso práctico, trabajando con mapas y datos de latitud y longitud, generando gráficos de barras y columnas, y empleando técnicas de segmentación de datos. Para aquellos interesados en expandir su repertorio, ofrecemos un segmento de gráficos de Microsoft Store y consejos sobre cuándo seleccionar cada tipo de gráfico.

Al finalizar este curso de Power BI, tendrás una comprensión profunda de cómo seleccionar, crear, y presentar gráficos para maximizar el impacto de tus análisis de datos. Únete a nosotros y transforma tu manera de trabajar con datos, convirtiéndote en un experto en visualización de datos con Power BI.

courseDetails.longDescription:
This is a course every employee, employer, manager, supervisor, c-suite executive, leader and more should take.

It focuses on how to manage workplace stress as an individual and from the perspective of the organisation.

It is one of the biggest issues of our modern world.

According to many surveys and reports:

  • As much as one in five workers say their workplace stress levels are high (20%)

  • Stress causes millions of workers to miss work daily, even causing burn-out for millions

  • Impacting the wellbeing, health and sometimes financial future of those workers

  • Impacting the organisations they work for in various ways

  • Many believe their work is one of the top sources of stress

The need to explore this topic is evident.

The need to explore it with workable, practical, actionable solutions for both employees and employers is fundamental.

That is what this course aims to do.

It is a look at the various approaches to helping:

- Identify the causes of stress

- Define the real issues, separating them from the circumstances

- Mark out ways of handling these same issues

- Defining roles and responsibilities for solutions

- What the individual can do about this

- What the organisation should do about this

- How to find help

and much more.

It is said that Stress related impact has a huge impact on those affected, carrying over into other aspects of their lives.

This course aims to equip you and your organisation with the skills to mitigate, manage and or eliminate stress in the workplace.

We, believe you will gain the requisite knowledge to implement appropriate interventions, systems to begin a stress-free workplace, as much as is possible.

courseDetails.title: Product Development & Customer Experience Management Diploma
courseDetails.shortDescription: CX / Customer Experience. Product Management and Development. Customer journey and touchpoints, CJM. Product Life-cycle
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course Product Development & Customer Experience Management Diploma by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 580 000 students.


Course Author:

Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Product Management

Product Management is a multifaceted discipline that encompasses the planning, development, marketing, and optimization of a product or service throughout its lifecycle. It involves aligning customer needs with business goals and coordinating cross-functional teams to deliver successful and valuable products. Product managers act as the linchpin between various departments, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.


Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.

Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:  Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.  Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.  Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.  Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.  Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.

Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:  In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.  Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.  Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.  Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.  Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.
